content:
This issue is partially related to GF 136-26, 22, 23
We currently have multiple Extension on Observation defined in the Core Spec. I think we should move/integrate them to the IG.
Some of them could be captured using our Observation.component approach. The complex extensions could be moved to the IG.
I saw these might cause an issue and put them on agenda for the call today, thanks @Kevin Power for finding the 7/11/17 notes!
